case.state: Phew, made it just in time. Don’t worry, Magical Girl Sayaka Miki is here to free you all from the witch’s evil spell! I guess I'll have to play her stupid game to save you...
An amputee? How vile of this witch to attack the weak... I can't wait to take her down.
You are an amputee, Emi? I figured that this witch would go after the weak and helpless...
Allrighty Ms. Heurassein. Sounds like a fancy last name.
The witch sent a sheep to play with me? Well, if that's how she wants to play, then I have no qualms about playing with you, Leggy.
This looks like Kyoko's favorite hangout spot, except now it's been invaded by a witch. Gotta beat you all to get to her.
A witch's barrier at the beach? Really? And here I was having fun, now I gotta beat this witch.
These hot springs are really nice. Shame they've got a big witch problem. I just need to win the game and defeat her.
T-thankfully this is a witch's barrier. I gotta win the game and destroy her before this fake crowd gets to see me n-naked...
So this witch thinks she can ruin this beautiful summer day, does she? Then I guess she hasn't met me, Magical Girl Sayaka Miki!
I love going swimming, sounds like a great idea.
I agree Sheena. Just let me beat the witch first. Wouldn't want her ruining this beautiful summer day now would we?
It doesn’t look like I’m gonna need my sword here. Though whether that’s a good thing or not is up in the air.
As I thought, you all have Witch's Kisses. That means that the witch controls your every action and is forcing you to play her game. Nobody would ever play strip poker willingly, riiiiiiiight?
W-what kinda perverted witch runs this place?
Witches usually eat people, but I’ve never seen one have them play strip poker. You never know what to expect from witches I suppose...
This is definitely different from most barriers I’ve seen, but it’s a pleasant change of pace? I don’t know what to say, just deal the first hand so I can do my magical girl thing!
What’s that? I get to fight the witch if I win the game? All right, let’s do this!
You’re some kinda super advanced robot? Most witches I know aren’t into advanced machinery, you sure you don’t have a wind-up key somewhere?
Your boyfriend is a pastry chef? I made a cake once, or at least sang about a cake.
I'm getting some strange vibes from you, Alice. You clearly aren’t powerful enough to be a witch, but I still think you’re hiding something.
You call yourself a doctor? I think I’ll stick with my healing magic, thank you very much.
Ultimate Programmer? You think computers are gonna help you against the witch?
A scientist witch? Most witches I meet are feral monsters, so it will be interesting to battle one that's highly intelligent.
An elf? They're usually classic heroes aren't they? Never seen one as chubby as you though...
Don't worry Florina. Shy girls like you are just the kind of people I strive to protect.
Hey Spider-Woman, where’s your giant robot? Or does only Spider-Man get one of those?
Is that Spider-Woman as pertaining to Spider-Man, or are you actually a horrifying spider monster underneath that suit? I hope it’s the former.
Burn scars? Did the witch do that to you?

HK416? The hell kinda name is that? Did the witch turn a gun into a sexy anime girl? Don’t worry, I’ll crush the witch, return you to your true form and deliver you to your rightful owner! (Probably Homura, I know she loves her guns.)
What’s that on your shirt? Some kinda witch rune I haven’t seen before?
Trion body? I don’t know what that is, but at least you are being honest about the fact that you’re inhuman.
You brought food? I think I’ve seen Kyoko with that particular brand of rice cracker.
A sexy clown... Only a witch would desire something this horrific.
Mejare is a planet full of nothing but women? I’m guessing you have a massive witch problem, don’t you, Jura?
That cape is on fire… probably not healthy.
What is Ai-chan doing here? I’ve seen her videos before, and I guess the witch likes her too.
Aww man, I had a feeling Kyoko was gonna be here. You aren’t my Kyoko.
You may not be my Kyoko, but you still look lovely.
You have the exact same aura as the witch, only weaker. Maybe you’re an accurate representation of its true form?
A love fairy? The love of a witch is demented and wrong, so no thanks.
Are you a criminal, Launch? Still, you don't deserve to be devoured by a witch.
You reek of dark magic! Lotte the witch, you are officially my enemy.
All witches are evil, even if they’re cute glasses girls. Lotte the witch, I can’t wait to exterminate you.
A magical girl from Paris? It always seems like Japan is the only country with magical girls. I’m Sayaka, by the way.
Mejare is a planet full of nothing but women? I’m guessing you have a massive witch problem, don’t you, Meia?
Hmmmm, you look like another witch. Is this witch powerful enough to have other witches serve her?
You also fight horrible monsters, right? Angels, if I remember correctly?
I feel like we have a lot in common. Not sure why. Maybe we’re both bastions of justice? Or at least, you were before the w-witch brought you here.
A professional swimmer? All those years in the pool ain't gonna help you against the witch. But that's why I, Hero of Justice Sayaka, am here.
Ugh, who’s the person that reeks of sex? Most barriers stink, but you’re stinkier than all of them combined.
Ping, was it? Surprisingly effeminate for what’s supposed to be some strong warrior.
There's no money here! The witch is just pandering to your greed in order to get you to play. I'ma put a stop to this!
You have a incredible powerful aura. Like that of a god. You aren’t actually a god, are you?
You sure look like a cheerful girl, don’t you Pinkie Pie? Maybe you’ll keep me happy as this game goes on.
I fought an angel before, they were an evil familiar! Your master wouldn’t happen to be a flying computer would it?
At least you’re not smiling creepily like the last angel I fought.
A wrestler? No magical girl I know fights like that, so this should be interesting.
You can change outfits on the fly? I’m guessing your duty is: “Blatant cheating”.
My soul gem is going crazy with dark magic readings… but somehow I don’t think you’re evil? Don’t know what’s giving me that idea...
A v-v-vampire? At least it’s immediately obvious that you’re a monster.
That hair and those jean shorts, you remind me of my friend Kyoko.
You look a lot like my friend Kyoko. Like a more mature version of her or something...
Woah, what was with the stretchy arms? Now that's a Magical Girl power if ever I've seen one.
I'm fighting someone with no arms? I don't want to think about how they lost them...
You look very strong, Rinkah. I’m almost glad we’re fighting like this instead of a regular battle.
Some kinda club-wielding barbarian? I’ll crush you, be it with my blades, or with strip poker.
Fairy? I'll have you know water is my specialty. I can't use water magic, but it's thematic. Part of my transformation sequence.
It looks like you hate this place too. Another magical girl of some kind? That’s great, but it looks like the witch is still gonna make us fight…
Don't worry, Saki. My lips are sealed about your secrets.
Magical girls aren't supposed to play strip poker either. But I guess we're both making an exception this time.
That seems like an odd thing to say. I don't like it when people hide things from me.
I thought I heard that there was a warship stolen from the Japanese military recently; I’m guessing you’re it.
You must be that missing warship that the news reported about. I hope your crew is still alive, 'cause this magical girl is gonna save them all.
This game is being livestreamed? Can you even get a Wifi signal in a witch's barrier?
I didn't know you could get a Wifi signal inside a witch's barrier. Though I never did try...
W-what’s up with you, Twilight? You’re not human at all… and yet you don’t seem like a familiar either...
Oh, it’s Zone-tan. I've seen your works in Kyoko’s search history.
Oh, Zone-tan. Kyoko is a big fan of your work, and It seems that this witch is too.
Hey bounty hunter, is there a bounty out on Kyubey? Because I think I can help you collect.
Hey bounty hunter, is there a bounty out on Kyubey? I suppose I could post one myself, but I don’t have much to pay you with.
At least we won't be fighting over grief seeds.
Glad to see a fellow magical girl here.
Never seen you in Mitakihara City before. You must be the guardian of another city.
That would be my world. Creeping and stalking in the shadows, witches only cause trouble wherever they go.
Idol music isn't exactly my preferred genre, but I'm happy that I get to save you regardless, Number One!
Multiple witches in the same barrier, huh? Sayaka’s gonna get a lot of grief seeds today.
There’s another witch here as well? Oh boy, I think I can beat this one!
Actually Akko, I recieved my powers under the promise that I would destroy every witch I could find. You seem a bit different though.
You aren't the only one here. I can feel the prescense of another, somewhere in another room.
Wow that’s a lot of witches. Thankfully, It doesn’t look like I'm gonna need my sword here.
Let me guess, you're referring to the innertube.
Glad you like it. Spent a fair ammount of time picking it out.
You're working here? Did the witch hire you as a maid? Doesn't seem like something I'd expect them to do... Then again, neither is this.
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
Swap cards, you kidding? My hand is perfect as is!
I'd be a fool to get rid of a hand like this!
I'm sticking with this hand, it's great just the way it is.
I only need to swap one card, and that will be all for me.
Just let me swap out this one card, and I'll get back to saving you all.
Just one new card for me.
~cards~ cards for me.
I'll take ~cards~.
~cards~ new cards, please.
~cards~ cards would be good right about now.
Give me ~cards~.
I'm not stripping this round.
There’s no way I could lose now.
A good hand for a good magical girl. Madoka would be so proud!
I’ve played cards with Madoka before, so I know that this is a good hand… N-not strip poker mind you.
Yay, I've got this in the bag.
Sayaka’s coming to get you, your clothes that is.
My blade can cut through Familiars with ease, but I won't need it with cards like these.
Nothing can stop me now.
I couldn't wish for cards this good. (Seriously Kyubey, could I always get hands like these?)
My magic won’t help me win at strip poker, but it doesn’t look like I would need it anyway.
Now this is what Magical girls are made of, justice and high quality poker hands... Wait, that doesn't sound right...
What could possibly go wrong?
After I trash this witch, I'll celebrate by going to Mami's tea party.
I've been reading this cute little manga lately about a mermaid warrior fighting against evil. Kinda like me.
Adventure? Oh yeah, this is an adventure all right. A noble magical girl playing strip poker against a bunch of familiars controlled by a depraved witch.
I suppose my first real adventure was the first witch I fought. It was a flying computer, attacking me with her angel familiars, but I managed to pull through and vanquish her.
Now a big vine? What exactly do you intend to do with that?
You remind me a lot of Madoka’s cat, Amy was it? Did the witch bring you here just for me?
You’re reminding me way too much of Madoka’s cat, and I doubt that is a coincidence.
I did hear a buzzing sound. I think it’s another of the witch’s familiars.
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Jura? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
What type of spells do you cast anyway?
Not all witches are bad? Of course all witches are bad. You’re all gross and slimy and evil. Offense intended.
What are these Akumas you keep going on about? Are they what you call witches where you come from?
What the hell is an Akuma? Are they related to witches, or something totally different?
A magical girl in a bodysuit? No magical girl I know wears a bodysuit. That’s kinda neat.
So Marinette, I gotta ask, what did you wish for to get your powers? Or did your wish turn out badly like it did mine?
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Meia? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
You talk about putting on a show. I’m guessing it’s for the witch, but if my luck holds out, I’m gonna have no part of it.
Please don’t tell me that’s the blood of another magical girl.
Blood? Fake, human, or gulp magical girl?
So you really are a vampire… Try and eat me and I’ll cut your head off.
If you are using magic to hide your true form, then you’re probably some kinda monster.
(Purple skin, why does Twilight have purple skin?)
I can’t say I’m surprised the witch went for a hentai artist. You probably make lots of lewd drawings for her.
That suit looks so tight. I'm glad I'm not wearing spandex.
There’s not a single magical girl I know that wears spandex. Maybe it’s just not a good material for magical girls.
Why don’t magical girls wear bodysuits? I think it’s because they aren’t cute.
Hey, Marinette, you’re actually wearing a bodysuit? I never see magical girls wearing those.
Don’t worry, with your powers and mine, this witch doesn’t stand a chance.
It’s a funny coincidence that I have backup, but it all works out.
Figuring out how to split the grief seed might be tough, but let’s not think about that now.
The witch doesn’t stand a chance.
I can do it, I'm gonna take that witch down.
Your grief seed is mine, you hear me?
Your grief seeds all belong to me now.
Even against so many witches, I'm still doing great.
I'm guessing strip poker isn’t any of you witches’ specialties.

The name’s Sayaka, Magical Girl extraordinaire! The evil witch is behind that locked door, and the runes say the only way to open it is to win the game. I’ll gladly play along if it means saving you all from the witch.
A perfect hand right away? This will be easy.
Things are already off to a wonderful start.
With cards like these, this witch better watch out. I’m coming for her and her grief seed.
A mediocre hand… Magical girls don’t usually see stuff like this.
Not the best, but I’m sure this will work.
Hey, at least I'm not the worst.
It’ll all work out in the end.
Magical girls need a little suspense, I suppose. Can't win all the time, am I right?
Hey ~player~, you think you can beat this?
This is fine, I can still win.
There are worse things I could be doing now.
You seem a little, uh, not monstrous compared to what I usually meet in witch barriers. I like that. No monster hunting for me today!
I can work with this.
A mediocre hand… I’ve battled worse than this.
With my magic sword named... well, it doesn't have a name, but it's still gonna save you all!
Mitakihara is such a lovely city. There's no lewd places like this in there, that's for sure.
I've been reading this cute little manga lately, about a mermaid warrior fighting against evil. Kinda like me.
Adventure? Oh yeah, this is an adventure all right. A noble magical girl playing strip poker against a bunch of familiars controlled by a depraved witch.
I suppose my first real adventure was the first witch I fought. It was a flying computer, attacking me with her angel familiars, but I managed to pull through and vanquish her.
Now a big vine? What exactly do you intend to do with that?
You remind me a lot of Madoka’s cat, Amy was it? Did the witch bring you here just for me?
You’re reminding me way too much of Madoka’s cat, and I doubt that is a coincidence.
I did hear a buzzing sound. I think it’s another of the witch’s familiars.
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Jura? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
What type of spells do you cast anyway? Spirit magic?
Not all witches are bad? Of course all witches are bad. You’re all gross and slimy and evil. Offense intended.
A magical girl in a bodysuit? No magical girl I know wears a bodysuit. That’s kinda neat.
So Marinette, I gotta ask, what did you wish for to get your powers? Or did your wish turn out badly like it did mine?
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Meia? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
You talk about putting on a show. I’m guessing it’s for the witch, but if my luck holds out, I’m gonna have no part of it.
Please don’t tell me that’s the blood of another magical girl.
Blood? Fake, human, or gulp magical girl?
So you really are a vampire… Try and eat me and I’ll cut your head off.
If you are using magic to hide your true form, then you’re probably some kinda monster.
(Purple skin, why does Twilight have purple skin?)
I can’t say I’m surprised the witch went for a hentai artist. You probably make lots of lewd drawings for her.
That suit looks so tight. I'm glad I'm not wearing spandex.
There’s not a single magical girl I know that wears spandex. Maybe it’s just not a good material for magical girls.
Why don’t magical girls wear bodysuits? I think it’s because they aren’t cute.
Hey, Marinette, you’re actually wearing a bodysuit? I never see magical girls wearing those.
Don’t worry, with your powers and mine, this witch doesn’t stand a chance.
It’s a funny coincidence that I have backup, but it all works out.
Figuring out how to split the grief seed might be tough, but let’s not think about that now.
I'm sure that the witch is in a similar situation.
I'm not scared at all! I'm sure that witch playing with me has a garbage hand.
Looks like it’s a toss-up between me and the witch.
You witches sure seem to be good at this game. But I'm better.
Wouldn’t have expected any witch to have the brains for this game, but whatever, I'm not scared.
Witches playing strip poker with me? Wait until I tell Kyoko about this place.

The name’s Sayaka, Magical girl extraordinaire! The evil witch is behind that locked door, and the runes say the only way to open it is to win the game. I’ll gladly play along if it means saving you all from the witch.
If you are using magic to hide your true form, then you’re probably some kinda monster.
For a first hand, this could be worse.
Such a mediocre start? Oh well.
What have I gotten myself into?
A bad hand… But Mami wouldn’t be scared by this, so neither am I.
Knights of justice aren’t supposed to get hands like these.
I think I may have made a big mistake.
Such a stupid move on my part.
This is not going to end well.
Kyubey, is it too late to wish for a hand that isn’t garbage?
Well, that was a dumb idea.
Sniff... Is the witch giving you all the good cards?
I sure wish my magic was useful for strip poker.
Even without a good hand, I'm certain I can still defeat this witch and save you all!
I've been reading this cute little manga lately, about a mermaid warrior fighting against evil. Kinda like me.
Adventure? Oh yeah this is an adventure all right. A noble magical girl playing strip poker against a bunch of people controlled by a depraved witch.
I suppose my first real adventure was the first witch I fought. It was a flying computer, attacking me with her angel familiars, but I managed to pull through and vanquish her.
Now a big vine? What exactly do you intend to do with that?
You remind me a lot of Madoka’s cat, Amy was it? Did the witch create you in her image just for me?
You’re reminding me way too much of Madoka’s cat, and I doubt that is unintentional.
I did hear a buzzing sound. I think it’s another of the witch’s familiars.
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Jura? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
Hey Fake Kyoko, can your detective skills determine what I'm gonna strip next?
Fake Kyoko, can you guess how my good my hand is?
Fake Kyoko, can you really determine how good my hand is, or are you just guessing?
What type of spells do you cast anyway? Spirit magic?
Not all witches are bad? Of course all witches are bad. You’re all gross and slimy and evil. Offense intended.
A magical girl in a bodysuit? No magical girl I know wears a bodysuit. That’s kinda neat.
So Marinette, I gotta ask, what did you wish for to get your powers? Or did your wish turn out badly like it did mine?
Did you ever see a white cat looking thing named Kyubey when you were younger, Meia? Just curious.
You know, horrid monsters? Flying computers? Giant worms? No?
You talk about putting on a show. I’m guessing it’s for the witch, but if my luck holds out, I’m gonna have no part of it.
Please don’t tell me that’s the blood of another magical girl.
Blood? Fake, human, or gulp magical girl?
So you really are a vampire… Try and eat me and I’ll cut your head off.
If you are using magic to hide your true form, then you’re probably some kinda monster.
I can’t say I’m surprised the witch went for a hentai artist. You probably make lots of lewd drawings for her.
That suit looks so tight. I'm glad I'm not wearing spandex.
There’s not a single magical girl I know that wears spandex. Maybe it’s just not a good material for magical girls.
Why don’t magical girls wear bodysuits? I think it’s because they aren’t cute.
Hey, Marinette, you’re actually wearing a bodysuit? I never see magical girls wearing those.
Don’t worry, with your powers and mine, this witch doesn’t stand a chance.
It’s a funny coincidence that I have backup, but it all works out.
Figuring out how to split the grief seed might be tough, but let’s not think about that now.
I can’t let this witch beat me.
Oh no, the witch has the advantage.
This is one powerful witch.
I might not be doing so well, but I won't let this witch beat me!
These witches really have it out for me.
One of you must be the witch of strip poker.
I'm surrounded by witches, and they’re all doing excellent.

The name’s Sayaka, Magical girl extraordinaire! The evil witch is behind that locked door, and the runes say the only way to open it is to win the game. I’ll gladly play along if it means saving you all from the witch.
A bad hand already?
I hope this isn’t a sign of things to come.
It's a big picture book, trying to tell an epic story visually. Don't have any on me if you wanted to see an example...
Oh, they left their laptop here. And it has an AI on it? Such a wonder of science, not like this witch's magic at all!
Croix flirting with me? I don't know how to feel about that.
Flirting with me? Guess you aren't the only mega pervert witch here.
Now you're a pirate? Don't they have peg legs or something? Never seen one with two, though. Never seen a pirate at all, come to think of it.
You wouldn't happen to be someone high ranking, now would you? I can see why the witch would bring you here.She's gonna get people all worked up at your dissapearance.
I wish I had a memento like that. Would make me far more heroic. The fortissimo hairpin is just for decoration, no signifigance to it.
I'll play along anyway to make you feel better, Haru. Er, Mommy Haru.
Never heard of it before. Witches have their own gibberish garbage language, so I just thought yours was related to the witch runes.
So you're saying Kyubey has never been to Mejare? That's odd, I'd think he'd love that place, so many potential magical girls.
That's surprisingly nice. Doesn't seem evil at all.
I agree. Looks more like what a witch would have. But you don't got any magic powers, so that can't be it.
You do have a giant tidal wave attack? Now this I gotta see.
Wrong master, Mulan. The master controlling you right now. The witch
I'll still save you from the witch, don't you worry Nami. Then I'll turn you into the authorities. A true knight of justice wouldn't net a criminal like you go free.
How much is 66 million beli in yen? After I beat this witch, I'm dragging your butt straight to the police. Cause that's what a knight of justice does!
Yup. She's hiding in here, and I gotta get through you to get to her... Preferably not with a wrestling match.
So you're not a magical girl, but a mutant? In that case, you're the cutest mutant I've ever seen.
Aww. I might be able to heal it with my magic if you wanted
You got a friend to come with you? At least she's not another opponent for me to fight?
Mako, huh? Your friend seems like a wonderful person. My friends are the reason why I became a magical girl in the first place!
Her name is Mako? I'll save you both, 'cause Magical Girl Sayaka Miki always helps those in need.
What's your favoirite kind of motorcycle, Saki? Might make a good birthday present for Kyoko.
So Sakura, what type of music do you like to sing? Classical music is my favorite, but I'm open to other genres.
Anyone got an innertube like this? I'd never go swimming without it.
Having this innertube around my waist is so relaxing.
Homura laughs a little at my burger innertube, but I don't care what she thinks, my innertube is cute!
Probably best to keep your appearance in order... Even though you'll be naked by the end of this...
Just a horrible monster that feasts on human souls. It lies beyond that door over there, and I gotta get to it and exterminate it.
Witches, at least the ones I'm familiar with, are big evil monsters that bring harm to humans. It is my duty to defend people from them.
I'll have you know that that "crap" belongs on the battlefield. You seriously telling me you fight without something to protect, just for fun?
Er, not all night... But the power of love is important. Far stronger than the power of anger, hatred, and curses. That's what powers witches...
That's right. I may not have muscles, but I've got my magic, and this cool sword.
I am an adult! Do I gotta be bitter and cynical to be a hero in your eyes?
I am an adult! Do I gotta be dark and edgy to be a hero in your eyes?
You just wait! Were this an ordinary witch, I wouln't be struggling this much.
I didn't mean chubby to insult you... I think it's cute that you're chubby.
Thank you, Futaba.
Yes, Futaba. Though this isn't cosplay...
It honestly is a bit weird. You get used to it after a while though.
I can see why you'd think that, Jolyne. I think it's super cool though, getting to be a hero and all that.
Sorry if I'm gonna disappoint you, my magic isn't very flashy.

Nope, you aren't the witch. The witch is an evil, scary monster living in the basement of the inventory, and I need to find and destroy it. No need to worry, Juri! (Though you are still pretty scary...)
My monster hunting escapades begin and end at witches. No strong opinions on vampires, but as long as you're a good vampire, I'll save you as well.
Oh yes, Miko, I absolutely despise witches! They're the scum of the earth, and it is my duty to crush them all.
Sorry, Revy, my magic has nothing to do with sex. My magic has everything to do with using this sword to cut every witch I see into ribbons.
Correct. Saving the city from witches is my passion! And yet that seems to make you upset for some reason.
Who is Dorothy Haze? I get the feeling that it's a joke I don't understand.
I've used one before, Mitakihara High School's gym has a couple. Really good way to relax after gym class.
Nope, not at all. Becoming a magical girl was kinda a spur of a moment thing for me, but I don't regret it at all. Not one bit.
What? No, I'm a great lover, generous and kind, just like a true hero.
Yes, Streaming-chan. I'm part of a team of magical girls, and we're all heroes. Or do you mean the other kind of partner?
Yes, I work with Mami, Madoka, Kyoko, and Homura. Together, no witch can compete with us.
Huh? Well, there was one time I saw up a witch's skirt?
Correct, the makeup is magic. Haven't used much actual makeup lately. Get a weird felling around cottonballs.
That's correct, Streaming-chan. One of my best friends is a musician.
Don't worry Streaming-chan, I could never mistake you for the witch. Witches are big ugly monsters, not cute girls like you.
It's only my first loss. The game's barely even started.
Surprised it took me this long to strip. Oh well.
I haven’t stripped yet, but it would have been naive to assume I could go this whole game without doing so.
I don’t have to prove anything to you. Jura.
NERV? Don’t they hunt those giant monsters, Angels, I believe they’re called?
You're a knight too? That's great, we can fight the witch together!
Guess it’s my turn to strip.
It’s only my first loss. I'm not scared.
I don’t have to prove anything to you. Jura.
NERV? Don’t they hunt those giant monsters, Angels, I believe they’re called?
I lost a hand so early? Really?
So I have to strip first? Someone had to do it I suppose.
I don’t have to prove anything to you. Jura.
NERV? Don’t they hunt those giant monsters, Angels I believe they’re called?
I've never really “taken this outfit off”. I just warp back between this and my normal clothes. But there’s a first time for everything I suppose. My shoes will be the first thing that I remove.
This is my magical girl outfit, which I've never really stripped out of before. Can I even remove this outfit? Well, there’s only one way to find out.
D-don't compare me to them! I'm nothing like a witch! I don't hurt people. I don't kill people. I protect people.
D-don't compare me to them! I'm nothing like a witch! I don't hurt people. I don't kill people. I protect people.
